topics.body: I'm really torn. Tuesday I'm going out to see a movie, and I'm not sure what to see. I loved How To Train Your Dragon, and I've heard the sequel is really good. Same for 22 Jump Street, and then again I also want to see Jersey Boys because its got music that I love and its directed by Clint motherfucking Eastwood. I love Clint Eastwood, even if he does talk to invisible presidents.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7
